@togarza @rickallenlive my oldest daughter is completely fluent so it's really annoying for me :)
@LeePHoughton very hard question but grew up listening to the songs DownNOutz plays
@togarza @rickallenlive un poquito!
@CindyInTexas i think seeing the Eagles for the 1st time on the Hotel California tour before I even joined Def Leppard -  incredible!
@ShaaqyRMZ  stephen king's pet sematary
@daveypen had to have been Tesla - those guys are great - love those guys!
@TrophyWife2Cent  I love devotional music that really feeds your soul
@MikeEdwards66 had to have been from what I can remember HYSTERIA was the most incredible experience i've ever been through
@lepgurl4ever it has to start with the music this last collection i started at the beginning of HYSTERIA and worked my way through each song
@bobbidalton454 i think 'intention' from 'rock on canvas' it's almost like a self portrait, like an x-ray from my head
@CindyInTexas first 2 shows were challenging & experienced xtreme cramping in legs but got over it. No downside otherwise
@duckmark we filmed everything, so i think it's safe to say that footage will surface at some point...not sure when
@CindyInTexas idea came when we were in Kansas which the sunflower.  I like the way they makes me feel!
@RockBrigadeFF a good question...definitely white lightening - love playing that!
@RebeccaM80 i've gotta say i loved playing "work it out" tip of my hat to Vivian - great song!
@kcampbell39 maybe
@LeePHoughton the planets
@plaidbear when we were on this last european leg, i ate way too much bread and came back 10lbs heavier than i went with!
@Danthemana some of the moments that were more private. im not sure people realized how sweet he was. he was always really supportive of me
@bixler_kate @rickallenlive thank you!
@dltourhistory he is happy all the time and yes.  he lives next door!
@LeePHoughton i guess i couldnt now, but wouldve loved to put 2 drum kits in a room with john bonham
@Lepplady76 with him last nite and have so much admiration for him.  looks and feels great. we have such great camaraderie  amongst us
@betacapsule we would love to - we've written songs with him, but he's so busy these days and it's difficult to pin him down
@MemeGtr as much relaxation as possible. i listen to inspirational type music - anything without drums :)
@isabella_sixx always ideas i am working on.  there are 3 new ideas i will be presenting soon
@AndyLGR i guess the answer is no but I couldn't see past the end of today at that age-I was just in the moment. I never take it for granted
@jonbon_girl hopefully soon
@SarahKellie1 it rains there, i have not seen rain in California since before vegas residency
@Hollie_Walston music is a great healer
@JSR62 yes and no - i'm not pushy. my oldest daughter's passion is dancing. my youngest is a natural. if that's where they want to go
@mapplepie childhood itself. i grew up really quite quickly and being in a band throws you into the world. I love my life :)
@pennysambora hard to answer love them all.  love to play "let it go"
@AMOSSAFETYREP  sheer heart attack and the song of the same name
@mizzou1307 glad to see that song getting it's day in the sun now!

@CaffeineDreams_ i'm not sure I can repeat that...
@lschaefer72 happy b-day lisa!
@Tavo_Rod19 really corny, but i really crave peace amongst nations. let's get on with life
@roseo007 it's always convenient in the states by bus
@Danthemana thomas dolby

@desertstorm72 joe came up with the idea
